verses.roman:
se patrīte lekhā āche--ei ta' likhana
īśvaratve ācāryere kariyāche sthāpana

synonyms: se—that; patrīte—in the note; lekhā āche—it is written; ei ta'-this; likhana—writing; īśvaratve—in the place of the Supreme Lord; ācāryere—unto Advaita Ācārya; kariyāche—established; sthāpana—situation.
translation: That note established Advaita Ācārya as an incarnation of the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
